long_description: Keep your ears toasty without the bulk of a hat or headband thanks to the minimal design and snuggly warmth of the Sprigs Cable Knit earbags. Earbags wrap a layer of Thinsulate(TM)-lined fleece insulation around your ears to keep the cold out. Polyester knit exterior with cable knit design. Overstock.
short_description: Keep your ears toasty without the bulk of a hat or headband thanks to the minimal design and snuggly warmth of the Sprigs Cable Knit earbags.
